author: th!nx

changelog.release_notes: Fixed Error with configuration Screen not showing
Bluetooth disc. vibrate,Animation Time,Time Alternative is shown,Reshow configuration in html

added configuration for :
- pixel size
- dots instead of blocks

Now Configurable:
- Date Format (MM.DD / DD.MM)
- 12H Time Format
- Weekday Strings
- Show Date in Pixel Field on shake
- Turn on/off animation on shake

description:
Big pixel time with animated  time transition.

Version (1.4)

Configurable:
- US Date Format (MM.DD)
- 12H Time Format 
- Weekday Strings
- Show Date in Pixel Field on Shake
  - Time Date is shown
- Animation on shake (on/off)
- Dots instead of Blocks
- Pixel Size
- Bluetooth disc. vibrate
- Animation Time

Also new:
Reshow current configuration in Config Screen.

Next Version will feature:
- Hourly Vibration
- Show Battery on Shake


Feature Requests and Bug Reports are highly welcome ! 
Even if i don't reply, please be sure i read them. :)

Please give a heart if you like this watchface :)

**
Attention iOS/Apple User:  The Description you read here is always for the latest Version out. Unfourtunatly Apple wants to prove the Javascript in all Pebble Apps. Till Apple does this you will only see the latest approved Version. There is nothing i can do about that.
**

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed Error with configuration Screen not showing

title: Big Pixels
